name: ms-dos-editor-theme
description: An MS-DOS Editor like theme for Visual Studio Code. It is blue.
author: Ionică Bizău <bizauionica@gmail.com> (https://ionicabizau.net)

description: It's important to install [this font (DOS VGA 437 Win)](https://www.dafont.com/perfect-dos-vga-437.font).
On Windows 7/10 you can install this font by downloading it and right-clicking the TTF file and selecting install from the list of available actions actions.

installation.h3: Activating the Theme + Applying the Font

ul: Search the VS Code extention library for `MS-DOS` and select `MS-DOS Editor Theme` from the results
After downloading the theme, apply it and reload VS Code
To get the proper font working edit your preferences under the `editor.fontFamily` option to include the `'PERFECT DOS VGA 437 Win'` font family.

installation: Your `editor.fontFamily` preferences JSON should look something like this:

code.content: "editor.fontFamily": "'PERFECT DOS VGA 437 Win', Consolas, 'Courier New', monospace"

blah.title: MS-DOS Editor Theme
